title: Inferno & the Good Girl
description: Baby Blu Jenson is a good girl Who left Comfort Springs to go to College After six years she is returning home to claim her man, Dante “Inferno” Page bad ass biker and the President of Devils Comfort MC.  Has she got what it takes to tame the arrogant violent man who in his own words “I’m not a nice man” or will the life prove to hard for her and walk away.  Dante “Inferno” Page loved Baby Blu and then she left. In the six years that she has been gone, he never knew if she was to return, now she is back.  Has the Biker got what it takes for the Good Girl to embrace his life style.  Devil Comfort MC are Bad Ass Bikers with their own sense of Justice and you don’t fool with them or with their Old Ladies, who old their hearts.  This book is about a life that is surrounded by violence, death, sex, swearing drugs, guns, fun and love  This book contains explicit sex and profanity and is intended for mature audience of 18+ only  There are acts of sexual content that some readers may find offensive. self pleasure, anal play (male and female), male and female sex., phone sex, there is so a little bit loving. strong language child physical abuse, drugs, guns violence, death Arrogant Dominant Alpha Men If this offends you please do not purchase    DCMC
author: Brair Lake
